title: Kratos in Fortnite?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.02.20
description:
Gary and Greg gab about a PS5 Pro patent, some other stuff, and THEN Kratos in Fortnite news breaks live!

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
The Wild Aces FCF Logo is official! Kevin, please show. kindafunny.com/fcf to vote on jerseys this week.
Gamescast is recording it’s Game Awards Predictions Today
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:35 - The first hint at a PS5 Pro? Robert Jones at T3
00:17:50 - FORTNITE UPDATE
00:28:20 - Did we miss a GTA 6 teaser? Luke Winkie @ IGN
00:32:11 - Someone’s Finally Studying Inverted Gamers, Keith Stuart @ The Guardian
00:41:50 - People LOVE Single-Player Games? Klepek at Vice
00:51:55 -  Ad
00:56:10 - QUICK BIZ THINGS
00:58:31 - Kratos possible skin
01:03:10 - Out today
01:04:00 - Squad Up:Glenn M(PSN) GlenNWO
01:05:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
